import "bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css"; import React, { useRef, useState } from 'react'; import { data } from '../Assets/data'; import '../Components/Quizz.css'; const Challenges = () => { return ( <>

CHALLENGES YOURSELF WITH
OUR QUIZZES!

Test Your Knowledges and Learn New Things!

BRAINYQUIZ - THE
SMARTER WAY TO PLAY !

{/*

Join Us, Subscribe to Our BRAINYQUIZ

{/* press the bell icon
*/} return( <>

Quizz UI

{result? <>:<>

{index+1}. {question.question}

  • {checkAnswer(el,1)}}>{question.options1}
  • {checkAnswer(el,2)}}>{question.options2}
  • {checkAnswer(el,3)}}>{question.options3}
  • {checkAnswer(el,4)}}>{question.options4}
{index+1} of {data.length} questions
} {result?<>

Your Scored {score} out of {data.length}

:<>}
)
) } export default Challenges;
